mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT * from cm where cm.cr_num=#{cr_num} order by cm_wdate desc limit #{startnum},#{perpage}) as cm_p order by cm_p.cm_wdate
select sender from cm where cr_num=#{cr_num} order by cm_wdate desc limit 1
mapper.update: update cm set is_read=1 where cr_num=#{cr_num} and sender=#{sender}
mapper.select: select sp.sp_title, pd_img.img_name from sp join pd_img on pd_img.pd_num=sp.pd_num join cr on cr.sp_num=sp.sp_num where cr.cr_num=#{cr_num} limit 1
select count(*) from cm join cr on cr.cr_num=cm.cr_num join sp on sp.sp_num=cr.sp_num where (cr.buyer_num=#{ur_num} or sp.ur_num=#{ur_num}) and is_read=0 and sender!=#{ur_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM cm where cr_num=#{cr_num}
